# Antools - Anton's Tools

## Overview
### Private library which is also free to public use. Its purpose is to be useful code keeper and use automation template throughout various projects.

## Getting Started

The antools package utilizes following libraries:

### Package Installation
Installable using pip. Execute:
```
pip install antools
```
